userreviews.userReview: This novel could be aptly summed up with this tagline taken from the text – It was time to place a haunted past to rest.I came to this second offering from D’Angelo without having read his first, Dark Running. Thankfully it wasn’t necessary as D’Angelo insinuates the backstory with subtlety.Artemus Dark, AKA the Big AD, is a metaphysician extraordinaire. In his world the paranormal is an accepted part of life, existing side by side with everyday normality. The Big AD is a psychic investigator par excellence – a self-proclaimed occult scientist who investigates crimes perpetrated by the shade community.His latest case concerns two psychics being blasted with an identical blast of psychokinetic energy, resulting in mental meltdown. One of the psychics is his old pal Eddie de Winter, the other – Big AD himself. Turns out it’s no coincidence but the result of a direful happening they experienced in the past.Add to the mix a dark-magic hit man hot on AD’s trail, plus the visions of a spectral zero-Fahrenheit ice-woman haunting his dreams, whispering ‘Come back to me...’ and you have the ingredients for a real terror ride.Overall, Darkness Becomes You is a thrilling read, though in some places the pacing falters a tad, forcing a speed-read to catch up on the action. But despite this nit-pic D’Angelo’s novel spins the reader into a dark world-scape that both perturbs and fascinates. Darkness Becomes You is a gripping read and a supernatural TV hit in the making.

I had the privilege of reading an advance copy of "Darkness Becomes You" after I told the author how much I enjoyed "Dark Running." After the first few chapters, I knew I'd be adding future works from Mr D'Angelo to my library.This time around, AD finds himself embroiled in twin mysteries - who is trying (yet again) to kill him, and why magical power surges are affecting him and his former partner-in-crime Eddie. We also get an introduction to Griselda Soleil, a character I hope will continue to be part of AD's world. I only wish there was a way I could hang with AD (and Gris) and chat about metaphysical happenings over run smoothies. Highly recommended!

description: The restless undead prevail as ARTEMUS DARK is thrust into a terrifying case saturated with a guilt-ridden past and a mysterious, metaphysical assassin who will stop at nothing to kill him.When an old colleague suffers a catastrophic psychic meltdown on his TV show – resulting in the deaths of innocent people – Artemus finds that their past together literally comes back to haunt him. In the darkness of a time he would like to forget, the paranormal investigator discovers that there are some things that won’t stay buried. Deadly memories, an assassin who uses magic to kill, and a mysterious woman in black rise from the shadows as Artemus races from the sun-baked streets of Los Angeles to the dark, deep forests of central France – searching for a past that is hell-bent to murder him.Pray he doesn’t find it.
title: Darkness Becomes You (The Second Artemus Dark Novel)
